description:
Take on a real tactical jumping adventure with Egg Over It: Fall Flat from the Top!!! A challenge where you'll have to lift the egg to the top in search of its source, but explore carefully; a single failed jump could lead to a long fall.

Guide it through sewers, buildings, aerial vehicles and skyscrapers.

Climb the egg to the top. Perform aerial moves, walk to be more precise or play using only the boosts.
Avoid making a wrong move or you will fall into the sewers starting from the beginning.
Remember that the egg is not circular, so it may play a trick or two on you.
See the scenery with a day and night cycle.
Enjoy the Andalusian music composed with Spanish guitar.
Let the game's narration envelop you during the game.
Illo, will you have “huevos” to beat this game?

Egg Over It: Fall Flat from the Top is a game where the only way to advance is “p'arriba”
name: Egg Over It: Fall Flat from the Top
